Literature.Title: Interaction studies of novel cell selective antimicrobial peptides with model membranes and E. coli ATCC 11775.
Literature.Author: Joshi S, Bisht GS, Rawat DS, Kumar A, Kumar R, Maiti S, Pasha S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25668(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter sp.(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=1µg/ml)
